data.text: @CBCOttawa Stfu and find smnthn else to do

@CBCOttawa What freaking “experts”? Who? Them smart ass mo-fos gotta have a name, no?

It’s always “experts say”….wtf….

@CBCOttawa No it doesn't...
Heck, you weren't even using tests designed for any variant anyways...!
All tests have been designed for covid and only covid...
And the question to its validity is big in its own since covid STILL has yet to be isolated from a human sample...
WORLD WIDE.!
@TyroneStreete2 @CBCOttawa Ottawa is traumatized because it's basically a farm for beta humans
@WashedupMXER @CBCOttawa *The virus I am referring to is not Covid19;  Its the detachment from reality experienced by the Truckers; criminal contempt and cold empathy*
@CBCOttawa Experts say that CBC are all paid Liberal shills....... #DefundtheCBC
@CBCOttawa Wow they sure did a number on you Canadians. yikes
